name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: I just got down from MT.MOON, but I'm ready!

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: Drat! A ZUBAT bit me back in there.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Local trainers come here to practice!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: All POKEMON have weaknesses. It's best to raise different kinds.

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: You're going to see BILL? First, let's fight!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: The trail below is a shortcut to CERULEAN CITY.

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Dad took me to a great party on S.S.ANNE at VERMILION CITY!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: On S.S.ANNE, I saw trainers from around the world.

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Hi! My boy friend is cool!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I wish my guy was as good as you!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: I'm off to see a POKEMON collector at the cape!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: The collector has many rare kinds of POKEMON.

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: I'm a cool guy. I've got a girl friend!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: Oh well. My girl will cheer me up.

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: I knew I had to fight you!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: If your POKEMON gets confused or falls asleep, switch it!

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: My friend has a cute POKEMON. I'm so jealous!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: You came from MT.MOON? May I have a CLEFAIRY?

name: Bill
Dialogue: Hiya! I'm a POKEMON... ...No I'm not! Call me BILL! I'm a true blue POKEMANIAC! Hey! What's with that skeptical look? I'm not joshing you, I screwed up an experiment and got combined with a POKEMON! So, how about it? Help me out here!
No!? Come on, you gotta help a guy in deep trouble! What do you say, chief? Please? OK? All right! When I'm in the TELEPORTER, go to my PC and run the Cell Separation System!
When I'm in the TELEPORTER, go to my PC and run the Cell Separation System!

name: Machine
Dialogue: Player initiated TELEPORTER's Cell Separator!

name: Bill after
Dialogue: Yeehah! Thanks, bud! I owe you one! So, did you come to see my POKEMON collection? You didn't? That's a bummer. I've got to thank you... Oh here, maybe this'll do.
RED received an S.S.TICKET!
That cruise ship, S.S.ANNE, is in VERMILION CITY. Its passengers are all trainers! They invited me to their party, but I can't stand fancy do's. Why don't you go instead of me?

name: Bill_before_leaving
Dialogue: Look, bud, just check out some of my rare POKEMON on my PC!
